extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller(Client client)
        convenience constructor for subclasses of type Controller. Sets the client and the player of this controller.
        Parameters:
        client - specifies the client linked to this controller.
        player - specifies the player linked to this controller.

    • Method Detail

      • requestMove

        public abstract java.awt.Point requestMove(Field f)
        Asks the player to make a move.
        Parameters:
        f - Field given to the player to make the move on.
        Returns:
        A point (x,y).

      • requestAddress

        public abstract java.lang.String requestAddress()
        requests the address and the port of the server to which the player wants to connect.
        Returns:
        the address and port entered by the player or null if interrupted while waiting for input of the player.

      • setView

        public void setView(View v)
        Sets the view utilized by this player.
        Parameters:
        v - the specified view the will be used by the player.

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(int millis)
        Sets the amount of time the player has to think about a move to the specified amount of time given by the server.
        Parameters:
        millis - The amount of time the player has to think over a move.

      • close

        public abstract void close()
        Closes all processes in the controller.
